head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WOODFIN, FRANK KIRK

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WOODFIN, FRANK KIRK

block.p: WOODFIN--Frank Kirk, on January 16, 2007. Born May 20, 1909 in Bellbuckle TN. A Princeton and NY Law School Graduate, employed by Standard & Poors as an oil security analyst. A Philosopher and Poet. Beloved husband of Ursula (nee Van Moecken) for 48 years. Devoted father of Thea, Suzanne, James, and Janet. Loving Grandfather of seven and great-grandfather of one. Funeral services Friday 12 noon at the Riverdale Funeral Home Inc. 5044 Broadway at 214th St, NYC.
